ops.description:
showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:42}); // {Cloud}
“I lived in this house
until I was 14…”

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:43}); // {Cloud}
“No, but this town was burned down.”

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:13}); // {Cloud}
“This is…my house.
It has nothing to do with what
happened five years ago.”

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:34}); // {Cloud}
“I'm all right.
The Company takes care of me.”

ops.raw: a5 00 00 e0 00 c6 ff fc ff 2b 00

ops.description:
showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:28}); // “Come, come…
Let me take a look at you!”
showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:31}); // “So is this a SOLDIER uniform?”
showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:7}); // “I'll bet the girls never leave you alone.”

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:9}); // “…I'm worried about you.”{PAUSE}“There are a lot of temptations in the city…”{PAUSE}“I'd feel a lot better if you just settled down
with a nice girlfriend.”

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:11}); // “You should have…”{PAUSE}“an older girlfriend, one that'll
take care of you.”{PAUSE}“I think that would be best for you.”
showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:35}); // “Is that so?”{PAUSE}“I know you can't cook…”{PAUSE}“I've been worried sick about you.”
showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:39}); // “I'll always be your mother…”

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:45}); // “Oh, really.
Then, it'll help me too.”
showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:44}); // “You're sick, saying such things…”{PAUSE}“Get out of here!”

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:46}); // “What's going to happen to this Planet!?
What the hell's Shinra doing!?”

dialogStrings:
{GRAY}“I haven't slept in a bed like this
…for a long time.”{GRAY}
“I'll bet the girls never leave you alone.”

“…I'm worried about you.”{PAUSE}“There are a lot of temptations in the city…”{PAUSE}“I'd feel a lot better if you just settled down
with a nice girlfriend.”

“You should have…”{PAUSE}“an older girlfriend, one that'll
take care of you.”{PAUSE}“I think that would be best for you.”

{Cloud}
“This is…my house.
It has nothing to do with what
happened five years ago.”

{Cloud}
“Hey…”{PAUSE}“I can't…remember much else.
There's…nothing more to talk about.”

{Aeris}
“Me too!
It's been a long time, right?”

{Barret}
“Tell us more!”{PAUSE}“You saw your family, right?”
Don't want to talk about it
All right…

{Cloud}
“I don't know if you'd call it a 'family'…”{PAUSE}“My father…died when I was still young.”{PAUSE}“That's why my mom……
lived alone in this house.”

{Cloud}
“My mom…she was a vibrant woman.
Hadn't changed at all.”{PAUSE}“But a few days later, she died…”{PAUSE}“But when I saw her, she looked fine.”

“Come, come…
Let me take a look at you!”

{Cloud}
“I'm all right.
The Company takes care of me.”
“Is that so?”{PAUSE}“I know you can't cook…”{PAUSE}“I've been worried sick about you.”

“What is it?”
{CHOICE}Nothing
{CHOICE}I want to hear your story

{Cloud}
“I lived in this house
until I was 14…”

{Cloud}
“No, but this town was burned down.”
“You're sick, saying such things…”{PAUSE}“Get out of here!”

“Oh, really.
Then, it'll help me too.”

“What's going to happen to this Planet!?
What the hell's Shinra doing!?”
